EDUCATION
Beachelor of Technology - Textile Technology 
& Engineering
Anna University
Aug 2015 – Sep 2019 | Chennai, India
Fullstack Web Development - MERN
Masai School
Mar 2023 – Feb 2024 | Bengaluru, India
TECHNICAL SKILLS
Core Web Technologies: HTML5, CSS3, 
JavaScript,  TypeScript
Frontend Frameworks & Libraries: React.js, 
Next.js, Redux, Context API
Styling & UI Frameworks: Tailwind CSS, 
Bootstrap, Material UI
Performance & Best Practices: Responsive 
Design, Cross-Browser Compatibility
Collaboration & Tools:  Git (Version Control), 
Asynchronous Programming, CI/CD Basics
Additional Skills : Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, 
Data Structures & Algorithms, Python, 
LangChain, LangGraph, Agentic AI
SOFT SKILLS
Problem Solving, Proactive, Easy to Adapt, 
Effective Communication & Attention to DetailPROFILE
Front-End Developer with around 3 years of experience 
building responsive and scalable web applications using 
HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and React.js. Skilled in RESTful 
API integration, Redux/Context API,  cross-browser 
compatibility, and performance optimization. Strong in 
problem-solving, debugging, and collaborating with cross-
functional teams to deliver clean, maintainable, and user-
focused code. Familiar with TypeScript, Next.js, Git, and 
CI/CD practices.
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
HOGR Food Network Pvt Ltd
Frontend Engineer
Feb 2024 – Present | Bangalore, Karnataka
•Built responsive, scalable web applications using React.js, 
Next.js, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and TypeScript.
•Optimized web performance and load times through 
efficient coding practices, caching, and cross-browser 
compatibility improvements.
•Integrated RESTful APIs and implemented state 
management using Redux/Context API to build 
maintainable, high-performing applications.
•Collaborated with designers, product managers, and 
backend teams to deliver client-facing features.
KG Denim Limited
Marketing & Web Development Associate
Feb 2022 – Apr 2023 | Bangalore, Karnataka
•Developed static web pages using HTML5, CSS3, and 
JavaScript for marketing initiatives and product showcases.
•Built promotional landing pages and internal tools to 
support brand communication strategies using Webflow 
and custom API integrations.
PROJECTS
HOGR
HOGR is the official online presence of HOGR Food Network 
Limited, designed to showcase the brand, services, and digital 
ordering capabilities.
ChocoChip.ai
ChocoChip is an AI-powered virtual assistant platform 
designed to enhance the customer experience in the restaurant 
industry. It features a dual-interface system: a Laravel-based 
admin dashboard for restaurant owners to manage data, and a 
React.js + Tailwind CSS chatbot interface for customers to 
interact with.
HOGR Ordering Web App
A mobile-first web application built for HOGR Foods, designed 
to simplify and enhance the restaurant ordering experience.
